xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Workspace Manager translation page workspacemanager.pluginnotenabled=The Workspace Manager java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the file 'wiki30-components-workspace-manager-<version>.jar' is present under the 'webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF/lib/' folder. workspacemanager.template.install.success=Workspace template has been successfully installed. workspacemanager.template.install.error=Error installing workspace template. {0} workspacemanager.template.install.notallowed=Admin rights are required to complete the workspace template installation. Please login as Admin to complete the installation.
# LABELS workspacemanager.createworkspace=Create a new workspace workspacemanager.members=MEMBERS workspacemanager.title.createwiki.wikiname=Workspace identifier workspacemanager.title.createwiki.desc=Workspace description workspacemanager.title.createwiki.members=Initial workspace members workspacemanager.title.join=Join Workspace "{0}" workspacemanager.title.join.empty=Join Workspace workspacemanager.title.leave=Leave Workspace "{0}" workspacemanager.title.leave.empty=Leave Workspace workspacemanager.browse=Browse Workspaces workspacemanager.browse.emptyvalue=N/A workspacemanager.browse.wikiprettyname=Name workspacemanager.browse.description=Description workspacemanager.browse.owner=Owner workspacemanager.browse._actions=Actions workspacemanager.browse._actions.join=Join workspacemanager.browse._actions.leave=Leave
# MESSAGES workspacemanager.wikiname.error.wikialreadyexists=A workspace with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiprettyname.error.empty=Pretty name must not be empty workspacemanager.successcreatewiki=Your workspace \"{0}\" has been created. You can access it at the following address: {1} workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki=Workspace \"{0}\" creation failed: {1}. workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki.ERROR_WM_WIKIALREADYEXISTS=This workspace \"{0}\" already exist. Please choose another name. workspacemanager.install.translations=The translations page has been automatically registered in XWiki's preferences. workspacemanager.error.workspacedoesnotexist=Workspace [{0}] does not exist
# PROPERTIES workspacemanager.prop.wiki.wikiname=WORKSPACE IDENTIFIER workspacemanager.prop.wiki.wikiprettyname=PRETTY NAME workspacemanager.prop.wiki.description=DESCRIPTION workspacemanager.prop.wiki.server=ALIAS workspacemanager.prop.wiki.owner=OWNER
# DOCUMENTATION workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.wikiname=The unique identifier of the new workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.description=A brief description of the workspace and its purpose. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on the workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.members=The users that can participate in the workspace.\n\ Tip: Use CTRL+Click to select multiple users.
